title: Watch: Recent microbial discoveries are changing our view of life on Earth
description: Videos capture the strange movements and predatory styles of protists — among the closest microbial cousins to multicellular life.

title: Non-Western art and design can reveal alternate ways of thinking about math
description: Focusing on the relationship between math and culture can boost student learning and expand mathematical knowledge, researchers say.

title: Vela’s exploded star is the highest-energy pulsar ever seen
description: A spinning dead star about 1,000 light-years away, in the constellation Vela, raises questions about how pulsars can emit such extreme radiation.
